actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide that any inconsistency between the prohibition against hunting wild birds or animals within the Olympic National Park and any hunting right or privilege of any individual or Indian tribe shall be resolved in favor of the prohibition against such hunting.

summary.text: Provides that any inconsistency between the prohibition on hunting wild birds or animals within the Olympic National Park in the State of Washington and the hunting rights of individuals or Indian tribes arising under a treaty between the United States and such tribes shall be resolved in favor of the prohibition against hunting within such park.

titles.title: A bill to provide that any inconsistency between the prohibition against hunting wild birds or animals within the Olympic National Park and any hunting right or privilege of any individual or Indian tribe shall be resolved in favor of the prohibition against such hunting.
